<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104572</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205428</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Think Globally: San Francisco Ethnic Dance Festival</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Denken Sie Global: San Francisco Ethnisches 
Tanz-Festival</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pensez Globalement : Festival Ethnique de 
Danse de San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pense Global: Festival Étnico Da Dança Do 
San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pensi Globalmente: Festival Etnico Di 
Ballo De San Francisco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκεφτείτε συνολικά: Εθνικό φεστιβάλ χορού του 
Σαν Φρανσίσκο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piense Global: Festival Étnico De la Danza 
De San Francisco</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK goes behind-the-scenes for a look at two dance companies that perform cultural dances, as they prepare to audition for the San Francisco Ethnic Dance Festival. This Educator Guide introduces students to ethnic dance and dance education.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN geht Hinter-dszenen für einen Blick bei 
zwei Tanzfirmen, die kulturelle Tänze durchführen, da sie sich 
vorbereiten, für das San Francisco ethnische Tanz-Festival 
vorzuspielen. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung stellt Kursteilnehmer zum
ethnischen Tanz und zur Tanzausbildung vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE s'attaque des derrière-le-scènes 
pour un regard à deux compagnies de danse qui exécutent des danses 
culturelles, car elles préparent pour auditionner pour le festival 
ethnique de danse de San Francisco. Ce guide d'éducateur 
présente des étudiants à la danse et à l'éducation ethniques de 
danse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA vai atrás-$$$-CENAS para um olhar em 
duas companhias da dança que executam danças cultural, porque se 
preparam para audition para o festival étnico da dança do San 
Francisco. Esta guia do educador introduz estudantes à dança e
à instrução étnicas da dança.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA va dietro-$$$-SCENE per uno sguardo a
due aziende di ballo che effettuano i balli culturali, poichè si 
preparano per audition per il Festival etnico di ballo de San 
Francisco. Questa guida dell'educatore introduce gli allievi al 
ballo ed alla formazione etnici di ballo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ πηγαίνει πίσω από-ο-σκηνές για ένα 
βλέμμα σε δύο επιχειρήσεις χορού που εκτελούν τους πολιτιστικούς
χορούς, όπως προετοιμάζονται στην ακρόαση για το εθνικό φεστιβάλ
χορού του Σαν Φρανσίσκο. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
εισάγει τους σπουδαστές στον εθνικούς χορό και την εκπαίδευση 
χορού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA va las detra's-$$$-ESCENAS para una 
mirada en dos compañías de la danza que realicen danzas culturales, 
pues se preparan para audition para el festival étnico de la danza de
San Francisco. Esta guía del educador introduce a estudiantes a
la danza y a la educación étnicas de la danza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205428</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104572</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/think-globally-san-francisco-ethnic-dance-festival</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
